lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: "Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle" - Plato

lenders.name: Ingrid
lenders.loan_because:
I can.  I don't have the courage to go to developing countries to help people on the spot, but helping out financially is something that I can do.  

However insignificant the individual sums may be that ever lender gives to Kiva; put together these many tiny sums can help change a person's life permanently for better.

So if you can have a positive impact on the world you live in, why not act instead of watching from the sideline?

-------

Proud member of the Swap-bot Kiva Team : http://www.kiva.org/team/swapbot

lenders.name: Blake
lenders.loan_because: I like to help other people and I want my children to learn about helping others as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on an ambulance and help people in their hour of sickness. I also get to run into housesthat are on fire occasioally, and put them out.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: people need a hand up not a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I build houses.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a start....

lenders.name: Ian & Amanda
lenders.loan_because: it's needed and we can do it.
lenders.occupational_info: Amanda teaches young children.  Ian manages a textile printing shop.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the chance to prosper financially.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a children's hospital in the medical records department.

lenders.name: prana farm
lenders.loan_because: God says to.
lenders.occupational_info: funky!

lenders.name: Ralph & Donna
lenders.loan_because: Kiva allows us to help less fortunate people.

lenders.name: drew
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy
lenders.occupational_info: i represent manufacturers

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I am a serial entrepreneur and enthusiastic to help those with the will, energy, passion and courage to create and run their own ventures. Ultimately many create jobs - a most noble endeavor. The more we can help others be self-sufficient the better and more at peace our world will be.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the CEO of a U.S. based company that provides services and engineers software for Air Medical Transport providers (helicopters and fixed wing). We have a noble mission and can help individuals - often in dire circumstances - survive to be here longer with their loved ones and to be productive citizens. I am the proud father of a son who is a newly registered barber - so - in his honor my first investment is in a barber shop. I too am extremely proud of my daughter who is an advocate for women's empowerment - therefore I am honored to invest in women entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: of many reasons: ability, responsibility, equality, reciprocity, empathy, altruism, it feels good.

lenders.name: vasco
lenders.loan_because: Ive been very fortunate in my life.

lenders.name: Tek
lenders.loan_because: I believe, loans like Kiva loans, the most effective ways of lending a "hand". Allows us as members of the human community an efficient way of helping each other. Some day I dream of all the people who were helped helping others in whatever way they can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company grow by building coumputer systems to solve complex business problems that would be harder to do without computers.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: As a former small business owner and a historian, I recognize the crucial role that small businesses play and have played in developing economies. Historically, agricultural revolution and industrialization in Europe was the product of hundreds of thousands of small entrepreneurial investments. It makes sense that development elsewhere requires the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach history to university students.

lenders.name: Bibi
lenders.loan_because: I care and want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Clear goals, hard work, dedication, honesty, respect and patience.

lenders.name: Hank
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone out. With just $25 (1 week of starbucks) you can make such a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping grape growers grow better grapes.

lenders.name: travis and stacy
lenders.loan_because: it makes cents.
lenders.occupational_info: I helps students that want to go to school.

lenders.name: Melody
lenders.loan_because: Other people have helped me.  Now it is my turn to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a factory that creates computer chips.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: It just seems like the right thing to do, so many of the people who apply for micro loans are just like me except living in a different country and I honestly would like to believe if the situation were reversed that they would help me.
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites, some of which I give away for free, I also create clip art for clients. My passion is horticulture,cooking and sewing.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I understand how lucky I am, and want to recognize those women who have thrived in more hostile environments.
lenders.occupational_info: Like many of the entrepreneurs on this site, I work whenever and however I can to pay the bills.  But my heart sings when I can work to change the world.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I think this idea is great. I personally heard stories of this micro loan idea really helping people in bangladesh from a co worker who has family there.
lenders.occupational_info: Basically I drive food to peoples houses.  And I use the tips (extra money people give me to show appreciation) to fund my account on this site.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and because I can, I should.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I was introduced to the Grameen Bank concept  and microcredit through a course I teach at FDU in NJ. This  is a fantastic and exciting program.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Philosophy, Spanish, American History and "Global Challenge" in three universities in NJ.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I can have a positive impact on the life of another person so they can have a positive impact on others.
lenders.occupational_info: I look at how my company does business and find ways to make the work easier or more profitable.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: As a business owner I think Kiva is a fantastic way to help create and support self-sufficiency which makes us all feel better about ourselves and our families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist and businesswoman. I work mostly with metal and gems, creating the tiniest of jewelry to life-sized sculpture.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: It's cool.
lenders.occupational_info: As a channel relationship manager, it's my job to make sure that the sales channels have the marketing tools needed to sell my company's products and services.

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: such a small amount of money can have such a big impact on someone's life.

lenders.name: Spa 1 Repair
lenders.loan_because: To pay forward life's gifts & to touch the lives of people around the world, hoping that in some small way, my company and my life can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Making the world a better place by seeing how many smiles I can put on people's faces every day is my life's goal. I earn a living by repairing barber shop, beauty salon, day spa  equipment and chiropractice and medical furniture repair

lenders.name: Kurtis
lenders.loan_because:
I believe very strongly that free markets and charitable giving will pull people out of poverty - not government intervention. Government aid agencies enrich corrupt governments and should be abolished.
The picture is of "Spuds" my best friend who had to be put down when he went blind.
lenders.occupational_info: Even though I am on disability because of schizophrenia (a mental condition that results in hallucinations and abnormal behavior) I still manage to make money investing in other companies. I also believe that even in the United States people like myself would be better served by charities than by the government.

lenders.name: Ray & Judy
lenders.loan_because: To give something directly back to the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired police officer, retired government worker

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women succeed in business to enhance their lives.

lenders.name: kikelomo
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we are one
lenders.occupational_info: I am a married mother of two young boys 5 & 2 .  I grew up all over the world and I want to give back to faces I can see.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: I think it is great to be able to assist those who are willing to work and put forth great effort get what they need to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I do all kinds of computer work, including building web sites.

lenders.name: LaVonda
lenders.loan_because: Indirectly someone helped me and I'm passing that spirit on to someone else that could use some HOPE!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people protect what's near and dear to them through   insurance.

lenders.name: Donn
lenders.loan_because: it teaches people to be self sufficient.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I have been privileged my entire life.  I graduated college without any debt, I live 5 houses from the ocean, I have an incredible job and I could not have done any of this without my parents and their finances.  It has been hard enough to begin my professional career without having financial concern, and so I have decided to give others some of the peace of mind that comes with having money to run with your dreams and support yourself or even your family.  I hope that I can make a small difference somewhere in the world that without Kiva I would not have been able to reach out to.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a multi million dollar book of business for a large international software technology company.  My goal is to increase product sales and revenue within my book of business every year.

lenders.name: Haven
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I own and run a small home furnishings boutique.

lenders.name: elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: i believe I am my brother's keeper and this is a great way of showing that. I am also very interested in helping women who need a 'hand up' so that they can live a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse and I work in a small hospital.

lenders.name: Alyssia
lenders.loan_because: "We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone." ~Dr. Loretta Scott
lenders.occupational_info: I help others become leaders in their businesses by learning how to take care of their employees and customers.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: i want to help start up businesses.

lenders.name: Inwha
lenders.loan_because: it will help the poorest segment of the emerging economies develop.
lenders.occupational_info: Provide debt facilities to corporates financial institutions and governments.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I care about people.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 6 year olds.

lenders.name: Tribe
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance!
lenders.occupational_info: Auditor / Quality Control

lenders.name: MELISSA
lenders.loan_because: God continues to bless me so I can in turn be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: My company performs oil field related jobs.  Among many other things, I basically account for all billings and costs of all jobs in each of our legal entities.   I then prepare each jobs work in progress.  I make all necessary journal entries for each entity’s financial statements and I prepare the consolidated statements.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I believe people should help each other and I like to help those who are willing and able to work to help themselves if given the opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a small time trader. I buy and sell arts and handicrafts.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it is a fun and interesting way to help women take charge and improve their lives.

lenders.name: Mohanbabu
lenders.loan_because: I believe every individual can impact the world by helping others
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Senior software engineer in a start-up company

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: I knew poor! I did'nt like it....

lenders.name: Dani
lenders.loan_because: this is a great opportunity to help people all over the world help themselves.

lenders.name: Barth
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: Unfortunately we live in a world where money does get you things that help you survive. I have some that someone else does not. I believe in giving to the world and this is one way to do that. Peace.

lenders.name: AlexInWilderland
lenders.loan_because:
The world is a better place for all, when there is less suffering for every individual and every animal, and when the earth itself is cared for with love.
We are all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people achieve their dreams. I care for animals, and I help to preserve the wilderness from destruction.

lenders.name: Delbert
lenders.loan_because: I can. I believe it is our responsibility to help others when we can. Both my partner and  I are lenders with Kiva and we really enjoy it. In future we will be increasing our loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office assisting lawyers in the area of real estate, buying and selling commercial real estate and businesses.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: one day, I too will need to borrow money.
lenders.occupational_info: I do those things other people cannot be bothered with.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help where I can.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a teacher. I don't work anymore. My grandchildren are  my life!

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I count my blessings every day. I was raised to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: My customers send me flower petals and I make them into beads. I them string them into rosaries or jewelry. God has blessed me.

lenders.name: Mrs. Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I, too, was an entrepreneur...and I loved every moment of it.  I remember the struggles of getting my business off it's feet.  I LOVED having my business!
lenders.occupational_info: I have been disabled for over a year now, but getting back on my feet.  Looking for the perfect job to jump back into!  Unfortunatey, I had to close my internet business, donating all of my inventory (597 brand new, designer, red-carpet gowns) to a local hospice.  Before having my business, a couple jobs that I had were:  Producer at Fox TV and I also worked at a travel agency that specialized in cruising.  Right now, I just am busy getting well and raising my 3 teenage daughters.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to make a difference in the world, but never knew how.

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes its the little things that make a big difference.  I enjoy helping deserving people reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info:
QUICK-TURN  collaborates with other entrepreneurs to restore old homes and other structures... and build new ones... for the homeless and families in crisis.  

QUICK-TURN provides excellent resources via a network of friends and supporters who truly care!   

QUICK-TURN helps people deal with life choices regarding  shelter... food... healthcare... career... education...  etc...

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: of a gift from my sister Patty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a govt agency, helping to manage water supplies in the western U.S.

lenders.name: Luke
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: In my free time I play the guitar, chess, and pocket billiards.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I loan mostly to Viet Nam, Cambobia, and Laos.  I served in Viet Nam for 18 months, and I feel an obligation to help out.

lenders.name: Donna & AJ
lenders.loan_because: This is a great program.  I am more than happy to help people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a bank.  I am the person who helps the bank's employees utilize their benefits and get training.  I also ensure the bank follows legal employment practices.

lenders.name: kerry
lenders.loan_because: I believe that part of our lifework is to reach out to others and help them along in whatever way we can.

lenders.name: Cassie & Nikki
lenders.loan_because: We are in First Grade. We are learning we can have an impact upon the world we live in. One  important way is contributing to those that need just a little help. It *is* possible to change the world and we want to be part of it...
lenders.occupational_info: Living, learning, and growing up to be responsible, caring, giving global citizens...

lenders.name: Charlie and Sheila
lenders.loan_because: We live in abundance; it is a privilege to be able to share that abundance meaningfully.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate to have had many opportunities.  I wish others to have opportunity as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an electric utility.

lenders.name: Phillip
lenders.loan_because: I live in the land of opportunity compared to the people on this website, who live in poverty and have no other means of improving their quality of life. With assistance from the government in USA, I have earned a college degree in Diesel Truck Repair and wish to provide monetary assistance to disadvantaged people through global diversity. Social responsibility is the point I am trying to make, I just wish more people would take notice and try to make a difference in this competitive world. I saw this website on a news station, and want to get involved with my assistance toward unfortunate families.
lenders.occupational_info: My job at this time is fulfilling my education as a college student, learning business and finance in addition to my mechanical trade will allow a much better opportunity in the near future. Recently, I started a soap business that is growing beyond my expectations. A portion of my products are donated to shelters to benefit battered women and the homeless.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others find the kind of success I have found in my life.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.occupation: Factory representative at Jasper Engines and Trans
lenders.loan_because: I like the thought that I can help someone I have never met.

lenders.name: Dr. Joe & Abigail
lenders.loan_because: Generosity , who knows  maybe this will catch on and undermine the Greedy  "Money Masters" Evil Banking Empire. We know The banking system,Government and Religion has caused  death and suffering to humanity  since day one, while they enrich themselves at the cost of human life. People can eliminate poverty and suffering  in the world by helping each other directly . A little kindness goes a long way. Our technology has surpassed our humanity, this must change  kiva gives me hope and confidence for the future..
lenders.occupational_info:
My family has been involved in Healthcare for over 100 years. Helping people live healthy productive lives. 
its all about mutual dignity.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: I loan becasue it is so easy and takes so little to make a difference in someone's life. How can I not do this?
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work for a computer software company and am responsible for generating business for that company as well as public relations and product development strategies.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: It's one good way to help people succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital on the night shift.

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for all and have always dreamed of being a philanthropist.  Making loans through Kiva is also my small way of honoring my friends and family who have helped my own photography business grow through micro-loans and small investments.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a photographer who takes pictures of food, scenic travel destinations, and everyday life.  One of my specialties is taking pictures of blind and disabled people in honest situations.  My photographs are published in magazines, newspapers, websites, books and advertisements.

lenders.name: Terry & Victoria
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it is such an easy way to make a positive difference and the link is so personal.
lenders.occupational_info: Terry, a CPA, took an early retirement from the US Postal Service to pursue a long time dream in finance.  Victoria continues homeschooling the last of our seven children while pursuing a degree in Family & Children's ministries.

lenders.name: BOTW
lenders.loan_because: I believe in creating sustainable prosperity throughout the world, and that through microfinance, the redistribution of power from the few to the many becomes an inevitability.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a website dedicated to uplifting humanity by way of the Humanities called "Buys of the World".  We are a community of creative consumers dedicated to using the resources within our community to express the spirit and uplift man and woman kind

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Proverbial rocket scientist.

lenders.name: Josephine
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have equal opportunities to get ahead in life.

lenders.name: Andrew & Rachel
lenders.occupational_info: Andrew is a graduate student studying how rivers interact with the landscape.   Rachel teaches music.

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because: Received a Kiva gift certificate, and discovered a great lending program.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: because i can make the same money work over and over again.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: I trust and I hope these loans will enable others to realize their dreams.  I have just recently heard of this wonderful organization on CNN.  I thought to myself....what a brilliant stroke of genius!  And who said one person could not make a difference?!
lenders.occupational_info: I load new Toyota vehicles on to rail cars.  from there they are transported all over the world.  My work requires no small amount of attention to detail.  As my work is conducted out of doors, and doing this in Canada, scarcely necessary to mention the weather seldom makes this an easy task.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.occupation: graduate student, Hebrew Bible and Ancient Israel
lenders.loan_because: Although I am a PhD student and living on government loans, fellowships and other financial aid, I am deeply aware of how lucky I am to live this life, especially in terms of the way most women live on this planet and the experience of the women in my family just two generations ago.  It brings me so much joy to contribute to other women gaining the independence and opportunities we all deserve.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student at Harvard University, studying the Hebrew Bible and the history of ancient Israel.  I study Hebrew inscriptions from the biblical period and other ancient languages related to Hebrew. I work on archaeological excavations in the summer and during the school year I teach other graduate students and work on preserving  Akkadian and Sumerian cuneiform tablets in the museum.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I write procedures to help pilots fly

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: mary
lenders.loan_because: I WANT PEOPLE TO KNOW THAT  THERE IS SOME IN THIS WORLD THAT WOULD LIKE TO SEE PEOPLE BE HAPPY
lenders.occupational_info: I AM A MISSIONARY

lenders.name: Francisco
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have the opportunity to do it. I hope this money really helps those it goes to.
lenders.occupational_info:
I supervise the repair of aviation
instruments. I have fun at work and always like to work with people from other nationalities. I am also a volunteer youth futbol coach for girls, I love doing that even more.

lenders.name: Abiodun
lenders.loan_because: I want people to invest in my business too. I need money for business development. $5000-$10000 to be repaid on agreed terms and duration.
lenders.occupational_info: I am into supply and installation of Ceilings and Waterproofing materials for construction projects in Nigeria.

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in other people's lives.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepenuer and want to give back
lenders.occupational_info: Lead a business that provides interactive patient systems for hospitals

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: This gives me an opportunity to share some of my good fortune with those in need, and to promote the aspirations of others with vision and hope for a better future.
lenders.occupational_info: Direct medical care to patients.

lenders.name: Deion
lenders.loan_because: To make the world a better place  :)

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I believe what I do and how I live my life affects many many people in far away places I will never see or know; and I want to be careful to make my impact as positive as possible. God has blessed our family in many ways and made us the stewards of resources beyond our basic needs. We desire to share what we have and believe that none of us can truly prosper in a world where poverty and hunger exists.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a physician. I primarily work in family practice with uninsured people requiring healthcare in the US and also serve a rural population. I have a wonderful husband and I homeschool my three children. I also teach classes in healthcare, nutrition and gardening promoting self-sufficiency. We run a small store with organic food and natural products.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I have the ability and resources to share with others and feel I should do my part to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Becky and Grandpa
lenders.loan_because: Grandpa and I thought it was a really great idea!

lenders.name: Norm
lenders.loan_because: I wish to see others succeed in life and to keep families strong. It is my way to "pay forward".
lenders.occupational_info: Retired Air Force Colonel with a love of photography, astronomy, surfing, sailing, and the mountains.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: This system helps individuals raise themselves up.

lenders.name: Dani and Grandpa
lenders.loan_because: Grandpa and I thought it was a remarkable way to help others.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense
lenders.occupational_info: I work with high school students in an international school desiring to enter college or university.

lenders.name: Jen WG & family
lenders.loan_because: I have enough money to share. We are not at all rich by U.S. standards, but it's important to me to foster economic independence where I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in family planning in low income areas of San Diego, California.  I help by giving people information that will allow them choose how many children they wish to have and when they wish to have them.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women have a chance to make a living for themselves.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: Knowing that a relatively small amount from my perspective can make such a difference to someone else makes it an easy choice. I'm not in a position to travel and volunteer right now, so this seems like the least I can do to help improve peoples' lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I talk with people online about the products and services they wish certain companies provided, and work with those companies to help them understand their customers' needs.

lenders.name: Kyle & Tara
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: He makes computers do what they do. She gives children the gift of education.

lenders.name: Stephen S.
lenders.occupation: Supply chain management _ DuPont Wilm, De.
lenders.loan_because: I like the proverb give someone a fish you feed them for a day, teach them to fish you feed them for a lifetime.  I see Kiva teaching people to fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the supply chain group for a industrial specialty film whose major application today is in the photovoltaic ( solar cells that make electricity ) market.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs get started so they can support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Software business.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: it's helping people help themselves

lenders.name: Tim and Angie
lenders.loan_because: We believe micro-lending is an effective way to fight poverty and empower people.
lenders.occupational_info: Tim is a project manager for a large corporation.  My team creates complex software solutions for engineering and manufacturing of large aircraft.  Angie is a pediatric speech pathologist who lovingly helps babies born with cleft palates and other swallowing issues. She also helps children with a variety of speech and language issues.

lenders.name: Sabrina
lenders.loan_because: I want to know that I have tried to make a difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because:
It is the right thing to do!!!

Do or do not their is no try.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be given a chance to make their life better.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: it's the best way to spend 25 bucks that I can think of
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a middle school English teacher in Romania.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people less fortunate then myself, and invest my money in diverse markets is a good hedge against economic instability.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently a student at Colorado State University. I work and study all the time...

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: that's how I roll

lenders.name: Campero Family - USA
lenders.loan_because:
When you are born, you are crying and the rest of the people around you are happy.

We try to live our lives in a way that when we are going to be about to leave it, we are the happy ones and the rest of the people around us are the ones crying.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell small computers and bar code readers, used to collect data and improve businesses efficiency.

lenders.name: fernando
lenders.loan_because: I'm very passionate about helping people.
lenders.occupational_info:
I manage the Front desk of a Resort.
I also own a shopping website.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give something to someone less fortunate.

lenders.name: Toniann
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world -- one woman at a time, one family at a time.

lenders.name: Kasha
lenders.loan_because: I can and someone can benefit greatly from it.
lenders.occupational_info: I study all the time.

lenders.name: iriam
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Matthew and Abby
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people with their endeavors.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I make (and occasionally drink) coffee! I work in a coffee shop and we also serve food. I also work part time as a baker in the same shop

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: My mom introduced me to this website.  I am so grateful for everything in my life.  Its great to be able to help other people.

lenders.name: Peter & Sandy
lenders.loan_because: We want to help hard working people succeed.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I feel micro lending is the most effective tool to get funds to the individual with the most need.  Loaning is much better than giving, as it teaches fiscal responsibility and a business sense.  I lend to women with families, because I believe if you can lift the women out of poverty, she in turn will lift the family out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an Environmental Manager for a Global Energy company.  I have traveled to many developing and third world countries.  I can see the need for funding, and want to support it by my personal actions and commitment.

lenders.name: Ayron & Anna
lenders.loan_because: This idea is simple genius.

lenders.name: Stew & Dana
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping people develop the skills to support themselves. We would also like to contribute to creating a better balance of wealth around the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: Dana develops products for various retailers. Stew is a communications consultant, creating internal communications programs for large companies.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help other people be the best they can be.  If 25$ is keeping them from that, then I will gladly give that up.  I love helping people and hope that I can make a meaningful difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in Austin, Texas studying Government.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: "The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve most of the world's problem."  -  Gandhi

lenders.name: schlgr
lenders.loan_because: We want to give other people a fair chance.
lenders.occupational_info:
SCHLGR digital transformation
UX strategist, digital manager

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I was the son of a poor family.  After 35 years of work I have stopped to see where I came from and where I am now.  It is time to repay and pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a police officer and received injuries in 1981 that have now diabled me and I am unable to continue working.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: It's rewarding to enable others to improve their lives and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I design networking and technology solutions for businesses.

lenders.name: Mehitabel
lenders.loan_because: I feel guilty for having so much when others have so little.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: Developing countries requires developing markets.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell people clothes.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: we need to take care of each other, if no one else will.
lenders.occupational_info: knowledge is power so i try and deliver power to people.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to reach women struggling to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a widow.  I care for my 95 year-old Mother at home.   Many years ago,  I needed money and  someone to believe in me.  A wise and generous woman came into my life and helped me with a loan.  When I paid her back,  she asked me to repay her kindness by helping others in need.   That is why I am delighted to be involved in the KIVA project.  Her generous spirit goes on with every loan I make.

lenders.name: Janelle
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Mother

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: I should
lenders.occupational_info: I sell used clothes and other things

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate in this life to have enough to share.  I also want to set an example for my child.  If I want her to share, then I should also share.
lenders.occupational_info: I type notes for doctors about sick people in the hospital.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunity to be successful and to help make an impact in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help large corporate organizations solve their complex business problems.

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because: I support people who are trying to use capitalism to help their fellow human beings.  They can use this money much better than I can.
lenders.occupational_info: When not learning in school, I work by sitting in a room filled with tens of thousands of dollars worth of technology in it and trying to make sure that nobody breaks anything.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: Why not help someone who's trying to work and make a living for themselves?
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Logistician!

lenders.name: For Mom
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people succeed.

lenders.name: Long
lenders.loan_because: Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: Student, interested in technology

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a clinic where we provide speech and language therapy to children who have difficulty speaking, reading, or understanding spoken words.

lenders.name: Brandy
lenders.loan_because: I care about everyone and want to help people and show them that I beleive in them and that someone cares and is rooting for their happiness and success.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, I go to college and then I look for jobs!

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I think global & try to act local

lenders.name: Stephane
lenders.loan_because: I came up with so many answers to this question, but it boils down to...it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Moving into Case Management after decades of inpatient nursing.  In process of making West Coast my home. Growing as a person, learning and evolving.  Blogging.

lenders.name: Jim&Conchita Burmeister
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed with opportunity, now it's time to share that blessing with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping Landlords and property managers with their tenant problems.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea behind KIVA and would like to lend what I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small business (just me and two other estheticians), specializing in a holistic approach to skin care using botanical-based products.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: it's not charity
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my time reading books and learning about how books work.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to help others and I am a firm believer in supporting people who are trying to better themselves, their families, and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer and administrator with the local courts.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I can and I believe in helping the world.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: Helping others achieve their goal, offsets the risk of default. Traditional banking practices often overlook these start-up operations or structure loans with unrealistic interest rates.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm self-employed, work abroad in mainly less developed or Countries in turmoil.

lenders.name: Mankel
lenders.loan_because: I have visited a lot of different countries in Latin America and the Caribbean and I know how powerful small amounts of money can be there. I don't believe in microcredits from big financial Institutions with high interest rates, neither in the development policies of the last fifty years. I think with Kiva I can really help out people without consolidating existing dependency structures between poor and rich countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working on my doctoral thesis in Germany

lenders.name: The Three Treasures Zen Center
lenders.loan_because: Changing this world one action at a time creates so many positive actions that we feel anyone can change this world if we function correctly in it. How can I help YOU!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a Buddhist Zen Center in rural upstate New York,

lenders.name: Karolyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the growth of businesses in different parts of the world.  I'm fairly new to this and am excited that this organization exists.
lenders.occupational_info: I help manage families' investments so that they save for retirement and help sustain their lifestyles.  Everyone deserves to live a plentiful life by saving and learning about the management of their assets.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I think that this is the right thing to do.  I believe strongly in education and I have benefited tremendously from education.  I would never have achieved my education were it not for a variety of student loans; people willing to invest in my future.  This is one small way in which I can help someone's educational and/or small business dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I am educated and trained as a scientist, specifically a chemist.  I currently lead a team doing research and development of new chemical processes for the semiconductor industry.

lenders.name: jose
lenders.loan_because: for me is nothing, for them is everything
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for Telefonica in Spain. I am specialized in marketing for the youth segment. 
I am also a part-time professor of business administration, at Universidad Complutense de Madrid

lenders.occupational_info: I manage a collision repair center that repairs vehicles when they are in a crash

lenders.name: Steven

That even the smallest action, can have the greatest reaction when it comes to helping others in need. Kiva.Org shows how anyone, anywhere, can help somebody, somewhere in the world make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: New York Based Photographer

because GOD tell us to help our brothers and sisters.

Porque Dios los dise que alludemos a nustros Hermanos e Hermanas

lenders.name: I Care

lenders.occupational_info: I own a small clothing business, but I'm looking into becoming an airline pilot instead.

lenders.occupational_info: I help people quickly release any negative emotions that they are feeling.

lenders.occupational_info: I try to help by making peace and safety possible so that good people can live in harmony and prosperity
